title: A self mute button or being able to unbind the enter key.
body: As a gamer from a very young age. i have found out of all the games i have ever played that League Of Legends would be by far the most frustrating. i understand you can't choose your team mates ( unless it's in 5v5 flex ) which makes each individual team helpless to  one players action, whether it's intentional feeding, Rage quits, afks and just pure stupid plays. These actions because we're helpless to do ANYTHING about cause a lot of anger in league, i personally have had account bans due to being toxic. I think the game would benefit from a self mute option or being able to unbind the enter key it forces players not to be able to get themselves into situation where they can abuse other players and get themselves banned. it's a win, win.

replies.body: Or you can not be a dick. I've seen many chat bans in my day and wanted a way to mute myself too. Tyler1 had even begged riot for something similar so his account wouldn't get banned and he instead wouldn't be able to talk. But communication is an important aspect to league of legends if you plan on playing as a team. That is why they prefer to see players reform. Like myself for example #reformed.

-Dont be a dick
-OCE
pick one. 

Also, highly doubt reforming happens considering i get nothing but some of the worst (personality wise moreso than skillwise) time and time again. 
Considering these people do nothing BUT be toxic, without punishment i seriously doubt the reform thing is true.
